teasers.name: Whimsical characters
teasers.imageAltText: Baby penguin wearing ear muffs crocheted Christmas stocking
teasers.description: I have designs for Santa, Mrs. Claus, an elf (girl & boy), Rudolph, a snowman, a snowflake, a gingerbread man, a baby penguin, and more!

teasers.name: Custom designs
teasers.imageAltText: Hedgehog wearing a Santa hat crocheted Christmas stocking
teasers.description: I've made stockings featuring a hedgehog wearing a Santa hat, a buffalo with a wreath around its neck, and Mike Wazowski in a Santa hat.

teasers.name: Personalization
teasers.imageAltText: Fox crocheted Christmas stocking personalized with first name
teasers.description: Would you like your name on your stocking? $5 for personalization

gallery.imageAltText: Hedgehog wearing a Santa hat crocheted Christmas stocking
